title: Toward Fascist America: 2021: The Year that Launched American Fascism
description: In this short treatise that is part of an ongoing series, author and Podcast Host Charles Moscowitz, a conservative self-described deplorable, unapologetically and unabashedly examines current events in American politics and culture that he contends are moving America dangerously but inexorably in the direction of a soft form of Fascism. Moscowitz livestreams Mon-Fri 12-1 pm ET on YouTube and other subscribing platforms and podcast venues.
author: Charles Moscowitz
